original_text: Upon identifying a conflict, the system must set the contract’s STATUS to CONTRADICTION and prevent signature until resolved.
units: Upon identifying a conflict , the system must set the contract ’s STATUS to CONTRADICTION and prevent signature until resolved .

original_text: A prompt will appear in the UI for the drafter to select the binding term from a dropdown populated with both conflicting values.
units: A prompt will appear in the UI for the drafter to select the binding term from a dropdown populated with both conflicting values .
to select the binding term from a dropdown populated with both conflicting values
a dropdown populated with both conflicting values

original_text: Once a selection is made, the system must log both the original and selected versions to a `clause_history` audit table, ensuring traceability.
units: Once a selection is made , the system must log both the original and selected versions to a ` clause_history ` audit table , ensuring traceability .

original_text: Additionally, a real-time Slack alert must be triggered and sent to the `#legal-ops` channel to notify the legal operations team of the flagged contradiction.
units: Additionally , a real - time Slack alert must be triggered and sent to the ` # legal - ops ` channel to notify the legal operations team of the flagged contradiction .
sent to the ` # legal - ops ` channel to notify the legal operations team of the flagged contradiction
to notify the legal operations team of the flagged contradiction
